name: The Dutch Bank Café
address: 88 Inner Harbour Road, Trincomalee, Sri Lanka
close_time: Open 7 AM to 11 PM (Monday to Friday), 7 AM to Midnight (Saturday & Sunday)
description: Nestled in a deserted corner of Trincomalee Harbor, The Dutch Bank Café, is the first luxury restaurant to be opened since the end of the troubles.
